history.text: Hello! What's the name of the movie?
Are you here?
Bruce Almighty, a comedy film directed by Tom Shadyac.
It came out in 2003.
Could you tell me some things about the movie? Like, the plot?
Jim Carrey plays the leading role.
Sure! It's a movie about a TV reporter who gets the chance to "play God" for one week.
The opportunity is bestowed to him by non-other than God himself, who is played by Morgan Freeman.
That does sound like an interesting and unique scenario, it is intriguing
And judging by the actors, it seems that it would be something that i would watch
What is the rating of the movie, though?
The movie rates 5.7/10 stars on Rotten Tomatoes.
Although the rating doesn't seem like it's too high, given the fact that it's a comedy i think i'd give it a chance
do you have any more information about the movie?
Oh, I forgot to tell you, the CinemaScore is an A!
Have you watched the movie yourself?
I think you should give it a chance, considering one critic's review I read. It stated, "Carrey is hilarious..."
That is irrelevant.
Although i don't like listening to critics, that quote is good to hear
i think i will give it a watch judging by all the information you've given me
Since you don't like critics, I definitely think you will take delight in watching Bruce Almighty. "Be your own movie critic!" That's what I always say.
I hope you enjoy it however.
I think you will!
Do you have anymore questions for me?
Thank you, i think i will too, i have never been disappointed by those actors
No, i think that would be all
Glad to be of assistance. Please let me know how you liked it!
That way I can make better recommendations for you in the future.
Thanks for all the info, it was nice talking to you
Likewise. Always a pleasure.
Enjoy your movie! Don't forget to pop some popcorn.
I also recommend an ice cold Coca-Cola.
You need to keep refreshed what with all the laughing in your near future.
Haha, that alone, actually, made me laugh. Could you remind me what year was the movie released?
The year 2003.
Wow, that's actually long time ago, i'm surprised how i've never heard of the movie 'till now
That was now 15 years ago! It's understandable though that you haven't heard of it, considering you're not a follower of movie reviews.
Jennifer Anniston was in the movie as well.
So many of my favorite actors in a movie, that's crazy
Another noted actor, this has to be a good sign.
Excactly

uid1response.feedback: Judging by all the actors and the fact that it's comedy, i'll definitely watch it, and it's actually surprising that i hadn't heard of the movie before!
